Disabling the Welcome and Confirmation Dialog Display

You can disable the Welcome to Serena ChangeMan Version Manager dialog and the confirmation dialog boxes. The Welcome dialog box is designed to help beginning users while creating empty project databases, the sample project databases, and opening existing project databases. The confirmation dialog box appears whenever you copy, move, or delete items from within Version Manager.

To disable the Welcome to Serena ChangeMan Version Manager dialog box:

The Welcome to Serena ChangeMan Version Manager dialog box appears each time you start Version Manager unless you select the Don't show this dialog again checkbox or disable the welcome dialog box option in your user settings.

  1. Select View | Options. The Options dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  2. Select the Show Welcome Dialog check box.

  3. Click OK.

To enable/disable any or all of the confirmation dialog boxes:

All of the confirmation dialog boxes are turned on by default; however, you can turn many of the dialog options off (or back on) depending on the type of task you are doing.

  1. Select View | Options. The Options dialog appears with the General tab active.

  2. Select any of the options in the Confirm On group.


    • To keep a confirmation dialog from appearing when you copy items using drag and drop, deselect the Copy via mouse action check box.

    • To keep a confirmation dialog from appearing when you move items using drag and drop, deselect the Move via mouse action check box.

    • To keep a confirmation dialog from appearing when you delete versioned files or projects, deselect the Delete File or Project check box.

  3. Click OK.
